text:
Gulnazar Keldi (; 20 September 1945 – 13 August 2020) was a Tajikistani poet. He was born in Dardar He was an editor of the publication "Adabiyet va sanat" ("Literature and Art"). Keldi wrote the lyrics of "Surudi Milli", the national anthem of Tajikistan.
Keldi died on 13 August 2020 in Dushanbe from COVID-19, aged 74.
